page.title: 14A Child's Saturday
page.content: I get up about 6.30 am, go down stairs, make tea & toast for my sisters & mum, my dad has gone to work. Then I watch{television, {Wideawake Club}at 8.30 am, a variety programme with pop singers, cartoons, interviews. Sometimes I watch{World of {Sport}at 12 noon. I sometimes go{ {swimming at Basildon Pool}with my dad or play out with my friends. I usually have a sandwich, an apple and yoghurt for my lunch at 12 o'clock. Sometimes I go out shopping in the afternoon with my mum, while the video records{ {World of Sport}. Sometimes I play out, or stay in and draw pictures or watch television. I have my tea about 6 pm and watch the late night television programmes and go to bed at about half past nine. I have to have a bath before I go to bed.
